getViewId().Description: Returns view Id of a descendant of recyclerview child to track.

Parameters: int: Zero based position in adapter.
adapterPosition(int).Description: Sets adapter position of the recyclerview child to track.

ClassDesc: Subclass of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Parallax#IntProperty_E@. Using this Property, users can track a RecylerView child's position inside recyclerview. i.e. tracking_pos = view.top + fraction * view.height() + offset This way we can track top using fraction 0 and bottom using fraction 1.
